entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 01:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening then changing to rain at times mixed with wet snow before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near the water overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northwest 40 gusting to 60 near the water in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
